title: Veronica
creator_credit: Beverly Shaffer, Yuki Yoshida and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Nine-year-old Veronica Makarewicz leads a double life. Born of Polish parents, she dances Polish dances, goes twice weekly to a Polish school, and talks to Polish customers in her parents’ bakery. But this film shows that she is also very Canadian.
creator_credit_for_label: Beverly Shaffer, Yuki Yoshida and National Film Board of Canada
